sentences.sContent: In Orthodox Europe, mass religion seems to have decayed less.
sentences.sCn: 在正教会流行的欧洲地区，集体宗教信仰的影响力似乎衰退得没那么严重。

synos.tran: 衰退，[核]衰减；腐烂，[木]腐朽
衰退，[核]衰减；腐烂，[木]腐朽
使腐烂，使腐败；使衰退，使衰落

phrases.pCn: 衰减率；衰变率；衰变速度
衰变曲线；衰减曲线；退化曲线；余辉曲线

trans.tranOther: if traditional beliefs, standards etc decay, people do not believe in them or support them any more
to be slowly destroyed by a natural chemical process, or to make something do this

trans.tranCn: 腐朽， 腐烂；衰减， 衰退
trans.tranOther: the natural chemical change that causes the slow destruction of something
